name: xom_v2.api
description: Docker Nginx Php-FPM mySql phpMyAdmin Backups for XOm_v2.api [php:7.4.19-fpm]

scripts._create_folders: bash -c " cd system ; mkdir certs ; mkdir certs-data ; mkdir logs ; cd .. ; mkdir  mysql ; cp -r SOURCE PUBLIC ; cp 'system/build/buildAPI.sh' 'PUBLIC/' " ;
scripts._install_node_items: bash -c " npm install -g fast-cli open-cli systeminfo node-notifier-cli node-notifier " && bash -c " npm install nightwatch geckodriver chromedriver --save "
scripts._amplify_nginx_: docker stop DemoName_nginx ; docker run --name DemoName_nginx -e API_KEY=f51fd0a3ee355133684f5a6c489514d2 -e AMPLIFY_IMAGENAME=DemoName_nginx77 -d nginx-amplify
scripts._build: bash -c " npm run _install_node_items ; npm run _create_folders ; npm run _build_containers ; bash ./system/build/waiting_build_finish.sh ; docker restart DemoName_xom ;  echo 'DONE BUILD'"
scripts._O_: bash -c " npm run ysc_ ; npm run b__ "
